alert.note: Alert for Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 6:26PM EDT until August 15 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL SANTA ROSA COUNTY... At 525 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Point Baker, or 5 miles northwest of Milton, and is nearly stationary. Half inch to three quarter inch hail has been reported with this storm. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pace, Milton, Floridatown, Point Baker and Pea Ridge. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
